wiki.content:
"Sweetness" is a single by Jimmy Eat World. It appeared on the 2001 album Bleed American. The song was featured on the soundtrack for the EA Sports video game NHL 2003.
 It was originally written to appear on the album Clarity. The band played the song live many times during the Clarity tour, and a demo recording of it was included on the 2009 re-issue of Clarity.
 The song is available as a downloadable song for the music video game series Rock Band as part of a Jimmy Eat World three-song pack, along with "Lucky Denver Mint" and "Futures".
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.

 The song is available as a downloadable song for the music video game series Rock Band as part of a Jimmy Eat World three-song pack, along with "Lucky Denver Mint" and "Futures".

track.name: Sweetness
comments: demo version is the best...check it out if you haven't already.  way more raw.
i haven't listened to this in years, until now... it still sends chills down my spine <3
No the sweetness will not be concerned with me!
NHL 2003!! massive nostalgia whenever i listen to this :) [4]
Wow....I forgot how much I loved them!
